name: Smartphone Sports!
description:
A game made to celebrate the smartphone.

Play as Appy and discover your true potential and master the sacred art of Smartphone Sports!

Learn the secrets of the Smartphone from Master Wai Fai and embark on an epic quest!

This Game will never recieve controller support or a console release.

Play it while you still have a smartphone!

Made by Michael O'Connell (4 Sept - 5 Dec 2018)
